NODE_ENV.description: Environment name. Options are: dev, test and prod. Default: dev

scripts.build: yarn && yarn generate:exports && tsc -d && yarn bundle

build.description: Assembles `src` code into a single, minified JS module with type definitions. Exports `build` scripts into a build folder.

docs:all.description: Standardizes markdown and generates the API metadata.

docs:api.description: Creates a `project-api` Markdown in docs and an `index.d.ts` file in dist.

docs:publish.description: Generates end-to-end documentation for the entire project and publishes it to the `gh-pages` branch.

docs:standardize.description: Creates or updates a new readme with a standard set of readme sections, including a toc, yarn script documention, links to repo documentation files and a license

generate:exports.description: Generates index.ts files for all exports recursively in the 'src' folder

lint.description: Lints the codebase and the documentation

lint:fix.description: Lints the codebase and fixes auto-correctable errors. Runs prettier on the code.

sortJson.description: Performs aesthetic operations to make the project files easier to navigate and read

test.description: Builds and then runs tests and calculates test coverage. This should be run by CI.

test:coverage.description: Runs tests, calculates test coverage in debug mode.

test:debug.description: Runs tests with the debugger attached.

test:only.description: Runs tests and calculates test coverage. This should be run for local development.
